summary: Completed comprehensive testing of vendor notification system including backend APIs, email notifications, and frontend UI components

minor_bugs.issue: Authenticated notification endpoints require vendor to be linked to user account
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - affects only authenticated notification management

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 'Vendor not found' for test user not linked to vendor
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - expected behavior for unlinked users

ui_bugs.issue: Vendor registration page appears blank with 0 form elements found

passed_tests: Vendor registration creates vendor in database
Admin vendor approval endpoint creates notification and sends email
Vendor notifications by email endpoint returns notifications list
Vendor notifications by email endpoint works for non-authenticated access
Full notification workflow: register -> approve -> notification created
Frontend security: vendor dashboard redirects unauthenticated users
Frontend security: vendor notifications page redirects unauthenticated users
Homepage loads correctly with AfroMarket branding
Sign in functionality accessible from homepage
Backend URL environment variable correctly configured

medium_priority: Fix vendor registration form not displaying on /become-vendor page
Ensure vendor notification bell component is visible on vendor dashboard when authenticated
low_priority: Link test users to vendor accounts for full notification testing
Add form validation feedback on vendor registration page
